Description:
Detects command that type the content of ntdll.dll to a different file or a pipe in order to evade AV / EDR detection. As seen being used in the POC NtdllPipe

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: NtdllPipe Like Activity Execution
Query:
sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%type %windir%\system32
tdll.dll%' or command like '%type %systemroot%\system32
tdll.dll%' or command like '%type c:\windows\system32
tdll.dll%' or command like '%\ntdll.dll > \\.\pipe\%')
